question:
With reference to human sperm, match the List - I with List - II.

| List - I | List - II |
|---|---|
| 1. Head | p. Filled with enzyme |
| 2. Acrosome | q. Contains mitochondria |
| 3. Middle piece | r. Sperm motility |
| 4. Tail | s. Contains haploid nucleus |
explanation: Head contains nucleus (s). Acrosome contains enzymes (p). Middle piece contains mitochondria (q). Tail helps in motility (r).
